A

addPokemon(Pokemon) - Method in class Trainer
Places a pokemon under the trainer's possession.

B

bp - Variable in class Trainer
Used to communicate with the BattlePanel1.

C

choosePokemon(Bulbasaur) - Method in class Trainer
Provides the user with a confirmation page, and a short blurb about bulbasaur (the pokemon they have chosen in this case.)

Provides the user with a confirmation page, and a short blurb about charmander (the pokemon they have chosen in this case.)

Provides the user with a confirmation page, and a short blurb about squirtle (the pokemon they have chosen in this case.)
chooseStartingPokemon() - Method in class Trainer
Prompts the user which pokemon they would like to start off with.

F

faint() - Method in class Trainer
Used when a user is defeated in battle and has run out of remaining pokemon.

G

Returns the number of pokeballs a trainer possesses.

Returns the amount of cash a trainer possesses.

Returns the trainer's message.

Returns the trainer's name.

Returns the number of pokemon a trainer possesses.

Returns the number of potions a trainer possesses.

H

healAll() - Method in class Trainer
Heals all of the trainer's pokemon.

M

message - Variable in class Trainer
Used for creating a message that an enemy trainer will say before commencing in battle.

Used to keep track of the number of pokeballs a trainer has.

N

Used to keep track of the number of pokemon a trainer has.

P

pokemonRemaining() - Method in class Trainer
Returns the number of pokemon (not knocked out) a trainer has remaining.

Used frequently in JOptionPane's showOptionDialog method.

Switches the trainer's active pokemon.
switchActivePokemonFight() - Method in class Trainer

T

Trainer - class Trainer.
The trainer class is used to represent the user in the world of pokemon.
Trainer(BattlePanel1) - Constructor for class Trainer
Constructs a trainer that is in contact with the BattlePanel1 and prompts the user for a name and begins selecting a starting pokemon.
Trainer(BattlePanel1, String, Pokemon, Pokemon, Pokemon) - Constructor for class Trainer
Instantiates a trainer that has 3 starting pokemon and is in contact with the BattlePanel1.
